reviewText: the same answer, some people just like their vcr's.i will only say. their is so much more on the web.

Yep Yep - A total complete waste of money. The pretty girls on the jacket cover never appeared inside the DVD.There was however plenty of very grainy dark images of sleazy dirty nightclubs with very homely looking gals. If this is really what your into then be my guest and purchase a brand new copy for yourself !!!!!!!!!!
